channel.title: Help with client
channel.description: I'll give 1m to whoever can help my with my RSPS I accidently edited my run for my client it's a 508 and the run for my source works but it comes up in CMD for the run for my client "Java is not a internel or external command" sorry if I cant provide any pictures since i'm on another computer so if anyone can post the right command so I can edt it for the new one, thanks heaps!

item.title: Help with client
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

Try this:

@echo off
@title AussieScape
"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre1.6.0_23\bin\java" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar client 0 0 highmem members 0
exit

That’s what mine is (except for the “@title” copied yours so you could just copy that and put into your batch, anyways not sure if it’ll help and yeah what cannon said you need to set your environmental variables.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with client
item.dc:creator: @monetta monetta
item.description:
@monetta wrote:

@echo off
@title AussieScape
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\javaw.exe”
pause

Thats what I have as my client and my jdk version is 1.7.0_02 and my jre is 7.

Read full topic

You need to set ur environmental variables
